replies.body: Why are the champ mains we make fun of all sword people?

Because the generic sword fighter hero is the most common of protagonist types and hence the most boring.

Especially given they are usually designed thematically to be edgy/fast to draw the attention of immature boys (who probably shouldn't be playing this game).

You know, as much as I hate fighting Riven and Yasou, it is painfully clear the difference between a good and bad one of them. Master Yi is pretty braindead though, just need to know when and where to go in.
Fake news, the lion clearly has hands in the last frame.

I’d swap Yi over to scare crow, and Garen to Tin man, and Annie to lion. Granted that’s more a overly realistic approach to the matter and this is more for the memes. At least swap yi to the scarecrow.
If you want realism then Tinman is Orianna, Fiddle is Scarecrow and Lion is... Wait we don't have lion champ do we?
You got the knife-wielding cat, in the same family at least
Nice meme but someone already posted this exact same thing so nice try
